text:
Three pensioners received pension of Rs. 1,68,135 during the pensioners’ grievance day redressal meeting held here on Tuesday.

N.R. Ravindran, Joint Director (Pensions), presided the meeting in which Collector V. Dakshinamoorthy was present. A total of 41 petitions were received during the meeting and 39 were disposed of. Two pensioners were given Rs. 1,18,135 for medical welfare while one person received Rs. 50,000 towards family welfare.
title: Pensioners’ grievance day held
